Bila kecepatan konveyor diluar standar,: If the conveyor speed is outside the standard, the measurement duration will be less or more than 54 minutes. The adaptive zone feature will ignore data points with room temperature (below 40°C) to ensure accurate predicted SV.
Halaman ini menggunakan metode pembagian: This page uses the standard zone distribution method, meaning measurements should last 54 minutes.
